snippet.title: LEENIE'S TALE  - Trailer 2025 Horror
snippet.description:
On a quiet, moonless night, an unassuming train conductor named Ballin had no idea he was about to become entangled in an ancient, sinister mystery that haunts these lands. Will he survive this fateful night?
Steam page - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3051030/LEENIES_TALE/
Discord - https://discord.gg/wd9hYa9HSg
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ABGameDeveloper
VKontakte - https://vk.com/ABGameDeveloper
#indie #horror #survival
